name: Challenge Offroad SUV Car
description:
Challenge Offroad SUV Car is one of the most realistic simulator off-road SUVs. Realistic physical behavior of an SUV while driving on a different offroad, whether boulders puddles, prolonged rises or deep fords, it will make you believe in what you are driving a real SUV.
Features:
- Extreme rally racing cars
- SUV damage and upgrades
- Wheels for any taste
- Extreme rally racetrack
- Cool sound and visuals
